attributes.action: Ban religious preaching and pamphlets in the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is a multi faith country, however preachers and churches of many faiths often come to the streets to preach intolerance or just to push their religion on other people. We the undersigned believe that religion is personal and nobody has the right to push their own faith on others and that preaching or handing out of religious material should be banned on the streets.
